name: yunohost
description: YunoHost is a self-hosted server management platform aimed at making self-hosting simple. It offers a web admin panel and app catalog to install, configure, and update many services on a single box.
features: Application catalog: Install popular self-hosted applications with one click from a curated catalog of tested packages.
Web administration: Manage server settings, users, domains, and applications through an intuitive web interface.
User management: Create accounts with email addresses and control access to installed applications per user.
Domain configuration: Set up multiple domains and subdomains with automatic DNS configuration and SSL certificates.
Automatic backups: Schedule regular backups of applications and data with easy restoration options.
Email server: Run a complete email stack with webmail, SMTP, IMAP, and spam filtering configured automatically.
SSL certificates: Obtain and renew Let's Encrypt certificates automatically for all configured domains.
Single sign-on: Access all installed applications with one set of credentials using integrated LDAP authentication.
Update management: Keep the system and all installed applications up to date with centralized update notifications.
Port management: Automatically handle port forwarding and firewall rules for installed applications.
Command-line tools: Manage the server using CLI commands for advanced configuration and automation.
Multi-architecture support: Deploy on x86, ARM, and Raspberry Pi hardware with consistent functionality.
